A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Rian Johnson's portfolio as a director should tell you how underwhelmed he is at handling such a big name like Star Wars. Watch AngryJoe's analysis of this garbage movie. He says everything I find abysmal about TLJ. Disney is really just milking Star Wars like a space cow. Unbelievable. 

I hope they SACK Rian Johnson and improve their team of writers. Get JJ Abrams back on board\, if he wasn't already in for TLJ. 

With Battlefront 1&2 disappointing fans completely\, I think I'm just gonna remember Star Wars as Episodes 4-6 and KOTOR 1&2\, and the Thrawn books. Those are the best Star Wars experience anyone can have.
